about

Front-End Developer with hands-on experience building custom SharePoint Web Parts using SPFx. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React for modern SharePoint solutions. Skilled in enhancing SharePoint sites with dynamic, user-focused components. Strong collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and maintainable web solutions. Committed to clean code practices, UI/UX best practices, and continuous learning.

I believe in lifelong learning and continuously seek to expand my skills. Regularly explore and experiment with emerging technologies and tools. Leverage online resources to stay current with industry trends. Enjoy prototyping and testing new ideas to solve real-world problems. Blend curiosity with hands-on practice to drive innovation in my work..

A versatile developer with a broad skill set spanning front-end development, data analysis, and machine learning. Experienced in building dynamic UIs as well as deriving insights from complex datasets. Comfortable working across the stack—visualizing data, engineering features, and deploying intelligent systems. Use tools like Python, Pandas, and scikit-learn alongside web technologies to create end-to-end solutions. Driven by curiosity, I bridge the gap between design, data, and decision-making.

portfolio
  • Working with SharePoint Framework (SPFx)

    I’m actively developing multiple web parts in the SharePoint Framework, including news collection, people highlights, direct mailing to users, and other customized solutions to enhance collaboration and communication.
